content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Welcome to the X Games, the world's most famous winter sports freestyle competition. Grab your board and your ski's and travel to Alaska's spectacular snowparks where you'll discover new events, new moves, and a whole new level of competition. Includes 90's and Rocket Wings DLC.

X Games Events: Compete in challenging new ski and snowboard freestyle events and unlock even more events by playing.

Epic Snowparks: Alaska's X Games village contains the most incredible freestyle snowparks created for Steep yet.

New Grind Moves: Push your creativity and determination to master new grind skills and unbelievable tricks.

90's DLC: Kick it old school by bringing your game back to the gnarly days of hardcore tricks, music and style.

Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy).


Online Play (Optional)

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.

© 2018 Ubisoft Entertainment. All Rights Reserved. The Steep logo, Ubisoft, and the Ubisoft logo are registered or unregistered trademarks of Ubisoft Entertainment in the US and/or other countries. Used under license from ESPN Enterprises, Inc. X Games is a registered trademark of ESPN, Inc.
